input_data.title: Forever
input_data.overview: Doctor Henry Morgan, New York City’s star medical examiner, has a secret. He doesn't just study the dead to solve criminal cases, he does it to solve the mystery that has eluded him for 200 years—the answer to his own inexplicable immortality. This long life has given Henry remarkable observation skills which impresses his new partner, Detective Jo Martinez. Each week, a new case and their budding friendship will reveal layers of Henry’s long and colorful past. Only his best friend and confidant, Abe knows Henry’s secret.

response.analytical_summary: Forever is a crime procedural with a supernatural twist, centered on Dr. Henry Morgan, a medical examiner who is also immortal. The series blends forensic investigation with a personal quest to understand his condition and his long life, while navigating relationships with colleagues and a close confidant. The show explores themes of identity, loss, and the burden of immortality, offering a blend of procedural mystery and character-driven drama. The dynamic between Henry and his detective partner adds a layer of complexity and emotional depth to the narrative.
response.spoiler_rich_plot_summary: The series begins with Dr. Henry Morgan, a brilliant medical examiner in New York City, solving crimes while secretly grappling with his immortality, a condition he's held for centuries. He meticulously documents his past in a journal, attempting to piece together the origins of his condition and the events that shaped his long life. Detective Jo Martinez, his new partner, is initially impressed by his skills but remains unaware of his secret. As they investigate cases, Henry's past begins to resurface, revealing glimpses of his involvement in historical events and encounters with individuals who may hold clues to his immortality. His childhood friend, Abe, is the only person who knows his secret and provides support and companionship. Throughout the series, Henry encounters individuals who seem to know more about his condition, leading him on a quest to uncover the truth behind his immortality and the forces that may be connected to it. While he attempts to live a relatively normal life, his past inevitably catches up to him, forcing him to confront the consequences of his long existence and the impact it has on those around him.
response.keyword_sentence: Forever blends a crime procedural with a poignant exploration of immortality, set against the backdrop of modern-day New York City, as a brilliant medical examiner grapples with his long life and a mysterious past.
